data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Corinthians.
Sao Paulo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 11, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 14, Hernanes is on target to give Sao Paulo a 1-0 advantage.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 19, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Luciano (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 24, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 26, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Jo of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 28, Sao Paulo's Hernanes is on target but unsuccessful.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 36, Goal! Ramiro levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Victor Cantillo to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 39, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 40, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Hernanes (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Ramiro is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Corinthians's area.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 44, Corinthians’s Ramiro is on his feet again at Morumbí.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corinthians's Sidcley gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 45, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
The first-half has come to a close in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Victor Cantillo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
The away team replace Angelo Araos with Luan.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Corinthians's Leo Natel has run offside.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Morumbí.
In the minute 53, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 56, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Paulinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sao Paulo's Luciano breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 58, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Brenner is replacing Paulinho for the home team.
In the minute 59, Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Igor Gomes is on a sub for Gabriel for Sao Paulo.
Hernanes of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 61, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Corinthians make their second substitution with Romulo Otero replacing Victor Cantillo.
In the minute 62, Corinthians needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Corinthians make their third substitution with Gustavo Silva replacing Leo Natel.
Sao Paulo's Igor Vinicius gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corinthians will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sao Paulo.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luan for Corinthians drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.

Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.

In the minute 72, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians drives forward and Luan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Tche Tche. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Corinthians at Morumbí.
Jonas Toro is replacing Luciano for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
The home team have replaced Hernanes with Luan. This is the fourth substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 76, Gustavo Silva of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Nunes (Corinthians) is making a fourth substitution, with Gabriel replacing Ramiro.
In the minute 80, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Sao Paulo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 88, In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Pablo Felipe. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Morumbí.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.

Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Sao Paulo.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Mauro Boselli is replacing Jo for the away team.
Sao Paulo's Brenner scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
Jonas Toro with an assist there.
Sao Paulo's Brenner has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Tche Tche for Sao Paulo has been booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza and receives a first yellow card.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's fifth substitution at Morumbí with Bruno Alves replacing Pablo Felipe.
